title: unpopular exchange
description: My first Next.js and Typescript project: a web application for sharing, voting, and debating unpopular opinions and pet peeves.

title: qr code component extension
description: A remake of Frontend Mentor's QR Code Component challenge. Unlike the original, the user can generate, customize, save, and download QR codes.

title: blog preview card extension
description: A remake of Frontend Mentor's Blog Preview Card challenge. Unlike the original, the user can filter, sort, and search through six fake blog posts.
